price: Buufamiinsi kitaabaa (Qur’aanaa) Rabbii injifataa, ogeeysa ta’e irraayi.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
